Name: Gobindalal Mukhopadhyay
Title: CCD FUN MALL LUCKNOW
Review: Excellent place for a cup of coffee at Fun Mall Lucknow. Good environment and enjoyable experience. A must visit place at Lucknow

Name: kishangupta_21
Title: Usual shopping mall and enternitement center
Review: Mall is getting old and it is not being properly maintained. Washroom are broken. For clothes shopping there are many shops. Overall experience was just ok.Most annoying thing for food cafeteria where you have to get mall credit for ordering any food. In today's time when everyone has card and mobile for payment I don't understand why they need this.If you coming via own car ready to spend 15 min to 30 min just for entering in parking or leaving from parking on weekends and public holidays.

Name: Joyful Pawan - Energy Coach
Title: Many things under one roof
Review: Best shoping mall.. All branded items.. Gomti Nagar, LucknowShop and have fun..Search for my Non-profit NGO - MyEatingSchool for Dieting Nutrition and to Save the Earth..

Name: Narayanan
Title: Nice place to hangout
Review: Fun Mall caters to all audience and sections, shopping, food, movies, groceries, etc., It's like a one stop destination to entire family for an evening hangout along with buying what you want and eat what you like.

Name: durham05
Title: Good selection of shops
Review: Nice big mall with a good selection of shops. Food court also good but not enough seats for everyone who was there.

Name: Harsh V
Title: amazing place
Review: i visited many malls and shopping complex but fun is very good it is not so big then pheonix mall in lucknow but one think i so that they maintain the safety grill in all level so that small children can not fall down i visited the mall to see capitan marvel movie not so good but visit was awesome must visit

Name: Relax711750
Title: Supper
Review: I had been with my friends it was enjoy moment and it is a very good place to see and enjoy please go there and enjoy everywhere

Name: saurabh k
Title: Best mall in Gomatinagar
Review: Nice place to visit in holidays, for shopping but i think sahara ganj mall is bettet than this..... .

Name: Rasheedur Rahman Shihab
Title: Worth visiting
Review: One of the many average rated shopping malls of Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh. Among the other malls of the city, this one is worth visiting.

Name: Hedonist_Surya
Title: One of the "Quality refined" mall.
Review: Perfect place for chill-out & its comparitively less crowded than other ones.One of the best thing to enjoy there is the FUN CINEMA.All of the famous clothing and accessory brands are availible here including some famous food stalls and restaurants.

Name: Adil Rashid
Title: lko fun
Review: fun republic in lko gomti nagar .. is too big mujhe sabse aacha yaha fun ka movies laga sound quality is good and many brand are available

Name: abhishek g
Title: Personal visit
Review: A good mall in the city. It has got all the facilities, showrooms, brands for picking up. Fun rides for the kids and other things for entertainment are there at the mall. A 5  mins drive is the Gomti river front. A gud watch in the evening.

Name: Sandeep V
Title: Nice mall
Review: The Fun Republic Mall is a shopping mall located in Gomti Nagar, Lucknow.Built-up area is more than 970,000 sq ft.It was built by Zee Group in the mid-2000s at a cost of Rs 800 million . It comprises retail outlets, cinema, food court, gaming zone and 60-room boutique hotel.It has parking for 550 cars and average footfall of 25,000-28,000 on weekdays and 37,000-40,000 on weekends.

Name: Rasheedur Rahman Shihab
Title: Nice place to visit
Review: Fun Republic is one of the very few malls in Lucknow and Uttar Pradesh. Overall it is beautiful. Have visited this mall couple of times.

Name: sun_abhay
Title: BEST SHOPPING MALL OF LUCKNOW
Review: GREAT PLACE TO SHOP FOR HUGE RANGE OF BRANDS, NICE FOOD COURT, CINEMA THEATER, Great place for shopping, huge range of leading brands, nice food court, gaming zone, cinema theatre, classy and comfortable , parking some times becomes crowded  . A place of fun for family shopping.

Name: YatriForever
Title: Decent place, good food.
Review: Definitely this is one of those malls in Lucknow which has better ambiance and is less crowded; other than the multiplex area. Perhaps, being at Gomti Nagar helps. The original design and the quality of construction speaks for itself, being a Zee creation. I liked the food court. Recommended place for visitors to Lucknow.

Name: Akmal Y
Title: Small mall with big brands
Review: Probably the best mall in lucknow with good brands, cinelplex and food court. Best mall in Lucknow and nice to spend time and shop.

Name: 268yusufn
Title: FULL OF FUN IN FUN MALL
Review: The mall is big with goos stores too . But its not in the main city of lucknow. Its has wave cinema too . Usually the crowd comes for watching the movies.

Name: Harpreet S
Title: Can shop for multi brqnds here
Review: The mall is quite spacious. It has numerous brands to shop from. Major brands like Tommy, Gant, CK, Blackberrys, Nike, Shoppers Stop, Max.....provide an opportunity to shop for almost everything. One has lot of variety to select from. Location of mall is also very convenient with ample parking space. Food joints inside the mall are not too many but can find few like Mcdonalds, CCD. Overall a good experience !!

Name: P N M
Title: Very Nice
Review: Fun republic mall is situated in Pause area of Gomati nagar .You can purchase high quality of all type of materials home products, etc. It has good food products , Cinema & other intertainment center

Name: kalpajeetbhattachary
Title: Overall this Mall is real fun
Review: Fun Republic Mall is really very nice mall & off course suited for shopaholics. Specially Shopper stop, one should avail  life membership (free)  & Enjoy shopping all over India. Meena bazaar max,Spencer's for groceries & many more big brands to make your shopping experience awesome.  Also the food court serves varieties, surely recommend. Here one can eat, shop, play games, watch movies & ample parking place. Overall this Mall is real fun.

Name: Vikas G
Title: Nice mall offering good shopping experience...... and
Review: Very nice mall suited for shopaholics...shopper stop Meena bazaar max....Spencer's for groceries....& many more big brands...to make your shopping experience awesome ...here you can eat shop.... play games.....watch movies ...ample parking space....all in all good mall ...

Name: PK Arora
Title: Elegant
Review: Very decent with best of brands for shopping also the food court serves varieties, surely recommend .

Name: MJB_SG
Title: Excellent Shopping place for Branded Items
Review: I enjoyed shopping at this mall, specially the Shoppers Stop and BlackBerry showroom.I strongly recommend to avail life membership (free) at shoppers stop and keep enjoying shopping all across India :).

Name: rockzzM77
Title: One of the best mall in Lucknow
Review: Fun republic one of the best mall in Lucknow, having multiplex, food court, lots of famous clothes brand.

Name: authorneelesh
Title: a good mall- like any other mall
Review: Situated at gomti nagar, it is like any other big city mall and offers all the best brands and eateries besides movie halls.Walk in for a quick meal to to while time away if you have free time  as we did as we had finished site seeing and had a few hours to kill before catching our train.

Name: Anurag243
Title: One for all
Review: The Mall is one of the best in the city... the cinema in the mall is also good to watch movies.. have lots of options for shopping lovers..

Name: Nish0901
Title: Big Mall in Gomti Nagar
Review: There are many branded stores in this mall such as Spencer's, shopper stop etc. Fun cinema is also there if you want to see a movie. On the top floor, there is a good food court where you can satisfy your taste buds. Good place to go with your family and friends.

Name: KRISHNA T
Title: Full of fun
Review: A big nice mall located in gomtinagar lucknow. You get a variety of stuff here through various branded stores like max, shopper's stop, spencer's and many others. Here's there a Mc donalds as well and a big food court offering multiple food options. Multiplex is spacious and comfortable. Good for shopping, eating, movie or an outing with family/friends. Dont forget to watch XD movie here.

Name: Ravindra S
Title: Good place to hangout
Review: This is one of the cool place to hang out in gomti nagar. Most of the brand showroom you can find here in this mall. It has one of the biggest Spencer's outlet to shop daily items. Most of students in nearby location visit this place because of McDonald. Movie watching is yet another good reason to visit this place with big audi's and big screen. It is recommended to visit this place.

Name: Gurumurthy Bhargava
Title: Mall of Lucknow
Review: Fun Republic Mall is one of the best and most sorted Mall of Lucknow.This mall is located in the most developed part of Gomti Nagar, well connected and easily accessible .This place caters from Grocery including Green grocery on one hand to the most fashionable ensemble on the other hand .Fun Cinemas is an another attraction on the top floor along with an equally good food court.On the whole a good mall to hang around for all ages.

Name: Aditgarg93
Title: Good mall
Review: Fun republic mall in gomti nagar is a good option to shop for all mid range offers a wide variety to fit for every one budject specially a decent budject / movie hall is good / overall very nice experience

Name: Manvendra77
Title: Visited for watching movie
Review: One of the best mall in lucknow, having lots of shop of many brands, food court, and multiplex. I visited here for watching movie.

Name: greatsamar
Title: Best mall in lucknow
Review: Great mall. Having almost all brands. Multiplex Is also too good. Cleanliness is at its best always. Parking space is very good.

Name: Explore664351
Title: Mall....with cheap price....good for every one...
Review: With great new stylish look and all new feature....this mall is good for couples,family persons...all others..

Name: sid54321
Title: Mall with good shopping options.
Review: Mall with good location and wide range of brands like Raymonds, max, spencers and Fun multiplex with four screens.

Name: Shubham Gupta
Title: AWEsome Mall
Review: a good place for shopping, hangout and also movie.Yes, You can shop here with wide range of brands , there are some restaurant where you can eat some food and also a movie hall

Name: allwork99
Title: If you wanna pass your time with a movie, eat out....closest place
Review: Good to get quick buys from the  supermarket  for example, I picked up a good raincoat at an economical price, as it was raining in between the stay and didn't carry one for the trip.It also has a nice chineese cuisine restaurant which serves good meals. There is a multiplex where one can catch a movie.

Name: Jai1976
Title: Captain America
Review: I saw Captain America at the movie hall. Also did good shopping with my family. It has almost all shops here.

Name: abhi9032
Title: Nice Mall in Lucknow
Review: This mall is located in heart of Gomti Nagar. For shopping there are variety of branded showrooms here.Food court is very large in area and offers various varieties of food.

Name: musafir_nonstop
Title: Decent place to spend sometime indoors in summers..
Review: Located at Gomtinagar, it is one of the biggest malls of lucknow.. visited this place last weekend with family.. its a nice place to shop and spend sometime with family.. it has a play area for kids also inside the malls as well as outside there are some rides and swings where the kids can enjoy.. food court is on the top floor whereas Mc Donalds is on the ground floor.. food court has various options available like KFC, Pizza Xpress, Nathus, Royal Awadh, Desserts, Naughty food, Mad about China and many more.. ordered stuff from naughty food n desserts and loved it.. naughty food has a variety of combo offers available and that too at a reasonable price.. and desserts too has a lot of beverages n ice creams.. would recommend.. for shopping there are a lot of options you can choose as per your requirement.. there is a 99 store on the ground floor which is good so do visit that also.. although the items are not of 99rs but still the offers are good enough..

Name: agarwalshubhangi
Title: Awesome
Review: A very nice mall in Lucknow to hangout and shop as it offers variety of branded shops. It is beautifully decorated on festivals. The Christmas decoration was mesmerising.

Name: Vijay Jotwani
Title: A great Mall
Review: The Fun Republic Mall is centrally located at Gomti Nagar, Lucknow. It is vibrant and has a cross section of shops to cater for all needs under one roof. We had a great experience at that place.

Name: iamrajsg
Title: one very good mall in Lucknow
Review: Located at a very reachable place.. just opposite Reserve Bank Of India..Good place for shopping of clothes. has various good quality brands store available.only parking space is less. which creates an issue sometime.

Name: greatsamar
Title: best mall in lucknow
Review: one of the best mall in lucknow Located in Gomti Nagar, many brands available. The food court is good. Enough parking space underground and Gantry is very good.

Name: Denin A
Title: Nice Aura around it
Review: This is more or less the best mall in Lucknow. Presence of many premium brands also make it a shoppers delight. Parking is a nightmare though especially on weekends. Best mall in Lucknow for late night movies.

Name: Mohsin A
Title: Average Mall
Review: Located in Gomti Nagar, many brands available. The food court is not very good. Enough parking space underground but not properly lit.

Name: Ehsan R
Title: Going downwards
Review: I have had great expectations when this mall was commissioned. Within its first few years, it seems it's going downwards in terms of maintenance. The parking area has become horribly dark and rundown. As far as shopping is concerned, shops don't have variety of selection. The food court doesn't serve authentic food.

Name: Rishiseengh
Title: Shaan-e-Gomti nagar
Review: Being one of the best mall of Lucknow, Fun republic stands high and proud on the main road in Gomti nagar.The mall provide ample space for parking and various take-away food joints.it could be a great place to spend your leisure time in shopping and gulping some tasty food.

Name: Gurpreet K
Title: Good one around Gomti Ngr
Review: A good option in/around Gomti Nagar. Options for kids, majority of the brands are available, parking space of offices around the place is used up so no issues

Name: raks125
Title: very nice
Review: the place is not very big but it's a place where one would love to  visit once. the place has one multiplex also and food court too. i like the food court a lot.

Name: Anand G
Title: Possibly the Best in Gomti Nagar
Review: The Mall is a typical one with shops mostly targeting high end customers. However, the layout and infrastructure is very attractive. The Children's section is top class. The Food Court at the top is average. The more than adequate parking space is a pleasant change.

Name: anuj729
Title: Malls are the next leisure destinations in Lucknow
Review: If you are visiting Lucknow then you can spend some quality time shopping around at Fun Republic Mall.All the major brands like Shoppers Stop,Tommy Hilfiger, Blackberry, Levis you name them and you get them.It's a huge mall with ample of parking place and ideally located in Gomti Nagar one of the posh localities of Lucknow.There are wide range of restaurants and coffee shops few of them like Moti Mahal, Cafe Coffee day KFC .There is a children's play area where small electronic swings and video games are there.A newly opened 5 D movie theatre is also there. So if you are willing to have a nice past time then must visit the mall cum multiplex.

Name: NIHALFROST
Title: Nice place for shopping
Review: Located at a decent place... Had almost everything in one place... Good place for shopping at one place if you want to beat the sun... Nice place in lucknow...

Name: Ravi7980
Title: A place for time pass
Review: They have shoppers stop on the ground floor where you can find good clothing. A good place to hang out. Food court is also good. But not better than saharaGanj's food court.

Name: kartik9670
Title: nice rooftop restaurant
Review: visited 2 years ago,* a nice and bit costly rooftop restaurant*Croma Digital storeoverall i mostly visit here for shopping purpose's,not for restaurant.
